remarks: The group element order is either zero or a nonzero multiplier that annihilates the element.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2016.)
statement:
gexval.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gexval.2 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
gexval.3 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gexval.4 $e |- E = ( gEx ` G ) $.
gexval.i $e |- I = { y e. NN | A. x e. X ( y .x. x ) = .0. } $.
gexlem1 $p |- ( G e. V -> ( ( E = 0 /\ I = (/) ) \/ E e. I ) ) $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d .x. x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d X x $.
